00016 #ifndef networkanalyzerH
00017 #define networkanalyzerH
00018 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 #include "primarydriver.h"
00020 #include "xnodeconnector.h"
00021 #include "xwavengraph.h"
00022 
00023 class XScalarEntry;
00024 class QMainWindow;
00025 class Ui_FrmNetworkAnalyzer;
00026 typedef QForm<QMainWindow, Ui_FrmNetworkAnalyzer> FrmNetworkAnalyzer;
00027 
00028 //! Base class for digital storage oscilloscope.
00029 class XNetworkAnalyzer : public XPrimaryDriver
00030 {
00031     XNODE_OBJECT
00032 protected:
00033     XNetworkAnalyzer(const char *name, bool runtime,
00034          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00035          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00036          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00037          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00038 public:
00039     //! usually nothing to do.
00040     virtual ~XNetworkAnalyzer() {}
00041     //! show all forms belonging to driver.
00042     virtual void showForms();
00043 protected:
00044     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00045     virtual void start();
00046     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00047     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00048     virtual void stop();
00049   
00050     //! this is called when raw is written 
00051     //! unless dependency is broken
00052     //! convert raw to record
00053     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00054     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00055     //! record is readLocked
00056     virtual void visualize();
00057   
00058     //! driver specific part below
00059     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &marker1X() const {return m_marker1X;}
00060     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &marker1Y() const {return m_marker1Y;}
00061     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &marker2X() const {return m_marker2X;}
00062     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &marker2Y() const {return m_marker2Y;}
00063     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &startFreq() const {return m_startFreq;}
00064     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &stopFreq() const {return m_stopFreq;}
00065     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &points() const {return m_points;}
00066     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &average() const {return m_average;}
00067 
00068     //! Records below
00069     double startFreqRecorded() const {return m_startFreqRecorded;} //! [MHz]
00070     double freqIntervalRecorded() const {return m_freqIntervalRecorded;} //! [MHz]
00071     unsigned int lengthRecorded() const {return m_traceRecorded.size();}
00072     const double *traceRecorded() const {return &m_traceRecorded[0];}
00073 protected:
00074     virtual void onStartFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00075     virtual void onStopFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00076     virtual void onAverageChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00077     virtual void onPointsChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00078     virtual void getMarkerPos(unsigned int num, double &x, double &y) = 0;
00079     virtual void oneSweep() = 0;
00080     virtual void startContSweep() = 0;
00081     virtual void acquireTrace(unsigned int ch) = 0;
00082     //! convert raw to dispaly-able
00083     virtual void convertRaw() throw (XRecordError&) = 0;
00084     
00085     std::vector<double> m_traceRecorded;    
00086     double m_startFreqRecorded;
00087     double m_freqIntervalRecorded;
00088     std::deque<std::pair<double, double> > m_markersRecorded;
00089 private:
00090     const shared_ptr<XWaveNGraph> &waveForm() const {return m_waveForm;}
00091     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> m_marker1X;
00092     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> m_marker1Y;
00093     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> m_marker2X;
00094     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> m_marker2Y;
00095     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_startFreq;
00096     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_stopFreq;
00097     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_points;
00098     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> m_average;
00099 
00100     const qshared_ptr<FrmNetworkAnalyzer> m_form;
00101     const shared_ptr<XWaveNGraph> m_waveForm;
00102 
00103     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnStartFreqChanged;
00104     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnStopFreqChanged;
00105     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnPointsChanged;
00106     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnAverageChanged;
00107   
00108     xqcon_ptr m_conStartFreq, m_conStopFreq, m_conPoints, m_conAverage;
00109  
00110     shared_ptr<XGraph> m_graph;
00111     shared_ptr<XXYPlot> m_markerPlot;
00112     
00113     shared_ptr<XThread<XNetworkAnalyzer> > m_thread;
00114   
00115     void *execute(const atomic<bool> &);
00116 };
